tag_list: pr, business-development, gameforge, gamestar, journalist, public-relations, flaregames
overview:
Gunnar Lott was, from 1998 to 2007, one of the best known gaming journalists in the GSA region. He was Editor-in-Chief of the magazines GameStar, GamePro and Making Games.

From 2007 to 2010 he worked in Business Development and lead the games site GameStar.de to the No. 1 position in the german market, winning the “OnlineStar 2010” on the way.

From 2011 to 2012, he was Head of PR at Gameforge, Europe’s leading publisher and developer of free to play online games.

Early 2012 he went to flaregames, a Germany-based Mobile Games startup to become Communications Director.
